full_summary:
### Interior and Exterior Window Washing Services
#### Request for Proposal

**Reference Number:** `cb-5709-92482212`
**Solicitation Number:** `1000248542`

**Deadline for Proposal Submission:** June 28, 2023, 2:00 PM
**Expected Contract Start Date:** September 1, 2023
**Expected Contract End Date:** August 31, 2026

The Public Health Agency of Canada's National Microbiology Laboratory Branch seeks the services of experienced technicians to perform interior and exterior window washing, as well as other surrounding areas maintenance.

The work will be conducted at the following locations:

*   Canadian Science Centre for Human and Animal Health (CSCHAH)
    *   1015 Arlington Street, Winnipeg, MB R3E 3P6
    *   820 Elgin Avenue, Winnipeg, MB R3E 3M2
*   JC Wilt Infectious Diseases Research Centre (JCWIDRC)
    *   745 Logan Avenue, Winnipeg, MB R3E 3L5

A mandatory site visit is required as part of this bid. For additional information, please refer to Part 2 – Bidder Instructions.

#### Description
*   Unattended work may be required
*   Task authorizations will be used for "as and when needed" basis
*   Mandatory site visit required

#### Background
The subject of this Contract is to provide general janitorial services for the cleaning and maintenance of interior and exterior windows at the above-mentioned facilities.

This contract will be a fixed-price contract for three years with an optional extension of two years, if required by the client.

Only proponents who are able to provide a comprehensive plan for all required services, specialized equipment, and personnel trained in such processes will be given consideration. This contract will not be open to negotiation.

Bidders must comply with the Canada European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).

Please address your proposal to:

Montana Myers
Public Health Agency of Canada
Contact information: [montana.myers@hc-sc.gc.ca](mailto:montana.myers@hc-sc.gc.ca)
‌
(613) 447-7684

The proposals must be submitted electronically through the Canadian Bid system: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca)

There is also an Acrobat PDF document available for reference, which includes the specific detailed requirements and technical specifications.
